    Defining URL:http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut-clinicalnotes/ValueSet/documentreference-category
    Version:0.0.0
    Name:Argonaut DocumentReference Category Codes
    Definition:

    The Argonaut DocumentReferences Type Value Set is a 'starter set' of categories supported for fetching and storing clinical notes.

    Source Resource:XML / JSON / Turtle
    • Argonaut Clinical Notes

    Argonaut DocumentReferences Category Value Set

    The Argonaut DocumentReferences Type Value Set is a 'starter set' of categories supported for fetching and storing clinical notes.

    This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

    • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut-clinicalnotes/CodeSystem/documentreference-category

    Expansion

    This value set contains 2 concepts

    Expansion based on http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut-clinicalnotes/CodeSystem/documentreference-category version 0.0.0

    All codes from system http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut-clinicalnotes/CodeSystem/documentreference-category

    CodeDisplayDefinition
    clinical-noteClinical NotePart of a medical record where healthcare professionals record details to document a patient's clinical status or achievements during the course of a hospitalization or over the course of outpatient care ( [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Progress_note))
    otherOtherIndicates that the category is not covered by one of the pre-defined codes.
